article.title: Axiomatic Relevance Tolerance Theory
article.author: Yakubovich, S. M.
article.text: Sets are considered on which a symmetric and reflexive relation, called tolerance (similarity) is defined.. The structure of such sets is explored.. A classificatory theorem is proved stating an isomorphism of embedding of such sets in a model space (R).. The properties of particular sets' for which the similarity relation has been defined are investigated..
